name: Squarefinity
description:
No where to go, and endless loop, How far can you go!

Squarefinity is a challenging game that tests your ability to follow visual and audio cues while also being mesmerized by the Penrose Stair case, one of the most well know optical illusions.

By controlling the red ball with arrows keys (UP and Down) you will progress through the level landing only on white spaces. The black spaces will take away one of your lives leaving you with less room for error.
Learn the perfect strategy and be ready with the visual and audio cues to know when it is safe to move across the optical illusion.

UP Key - Move Up

Down Key - Move Down

Look at the colour of the column to see the next colour change!
